name: smart-saver-backend

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); try { execSync('curl -L https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o /tmp/yt-dlp && chmod +x /tmp/yt-dlp && mv /tmp/yt-dlp /usr/local/bin/yt-dlp', {stdio: 'inherit'}); console.log('yt-dlp installed successfully'); } catch(e) { console.log('yt-dlp installation failed, will retry at runtime'); }"

author: Smart Saver Team
description: Backend API for Smart Saver video downloader app
